title: Rza and Producer Mathematics interview and more
itunes:title: Rza and Producer Mathematics interview and more
description:
Monday 10/16- Today on the show we had legendary rapper RZA and Producer Mathematics where they spoke about the Wu Tang sound, selling the album to Shkreli, Azealia Banks and more. Also, we opened up the phone lines for "Shoot Your Shot" so one of our listeners can try to shoot their shot at a crush. This time it was a listener who fell in love after a 3 some. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to officer Hanifah Davis who attacked twin girls at a school.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Monday 10/16- Today on the show we had legendary rapper RZA and Producer Mathematics where they spoke about the Wu Tang sound, selling the album to Shkreli, Azealia Banks and more. Also, we opened up the phone lines for "Shoot Your Shot" so one of our listeners can try to shoot their shot at a crush. This time it was a listener who fell in love after a 3 some. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to officer Hanifah Davis who attacked twin girls at a school.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
